name: noggin
content:
noggin noun [C]
(AMOUNT OF DRINK)
Add to word list
Add to word list
old-fashioned a small amount of alcoholic drink, usually a quarter of a pint

noggin noun [C]
(HEAD)
mainly US informal the head or mind of a person: Use your noggin - think before you decide what to do!
